code: import React,{useState}from"react";import axios from"axios";import WeatherDetails from"./WeatherDetails";import"./Weather.css";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";export default function Weather(props){const[weatherData,setWeatherData]=useState({ready:false});const[city,setCity]=useState(props.defaultCity);function handleResponse(response){console.log(response.data);setWeatherData({ready:true,city:response.data.name,temperature:response.data.main.temp,feels:response.data.main.feels_like,humidity:response.data.main.humidity,date:new Date(response.data.dt*1000),wind:response.data.wind.speed,iconUrl:"http://shecodes-assets.s3.amazonaws.com/api/weather/icons/scattered-clouds-night.png",description:response.data.weather[0].description});}function search(){let units="metric";let apiKey="af2a32a0cac5cf8a4097b72fe7238e46";let apiUrl="https://api.openweathermap.org/data/2.5/weather?q=".concat(city,"&appid=").concat(apiKey,"&units=").concat(units);axios.get(apiUrl).then(handleResponse);}function handleSubmit(event){event.preventDefault();}function handleCityChange(event){setCity(event.target.value);}if(weatherData){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"Weather",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"Weather App"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("form",{onSubmit:handleSubmit,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"row",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"col-9",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"search",placeholder:"Enter a city...",required:true,className:"form-control",autoFocus:"on",onChange:handleCityChange})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{className:"btn btn-primary",type:"submit",value:"Search"})})]})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(WeatherDetails,{info:weatherData})]});}else{search();return"Loading..";}}
